properties.title: FFA Museum Altenrhein
properties.abstract: The museum awaits visitors with a unique combination of aircraft and motorcars.
properties.description:
The museum shows the whole history of aviation in Eastern Switzerland: The FFA Museum Altenrhein shows the development of the airport St.Gallen-Altenrhein, the company Dornier, the aeroplane factory Altenrhein, flying in East Switzerland and the history of the Swiss air force.

In the FFA museum, airplane meets motor vehicle: It also shows historical Rolls-Royce, vehicles from the 1930s as well as younger sports cars and racing cars.
properties.name: FFA Museum Altenrhein GmbH
